title: Excimer
author: Excimer
created_time: October 29, 2022, 11:22:06 AMLast edit: February 04, 2025, 04:48:17 PM by Excimer
content: List of users who changed nicknamesThe Pharmacist changed nickname to The Sceptical Chymistprofile: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=487418Ratimov changed nickname to Symmetrickprofile: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=2627711Poker Player changed nickname to Free Market Capitalist profile: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=2836461topic: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5527616.0u=1980983https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5418724.msg65003751#msg65003751u=1045971https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5418724.msg65007128#msg65007128u=18021https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5418724.msg65010351#msg65010351u=234099https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5418724.msg65026058#msg65026058Registry of "changelings" in the process of collecting information. Everyone can participate. If you have information about users who have changed their nicknames, you can post this information here. Information will be included in this list.This is only LOG. Here you can discuss a users who changed his nickname. A discussion where you can discuss the specifics of filing for a nickname change is here

comments.body: BTC_Bear changed nickname to JusticeForYouprofile: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=18021http://web.archive.org/web/20171126120414/https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=18021 source

comments.author: Excimer
comments.body: Peeps Place changed nickname to Rating Placehttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=234099Quote from: notblox1 on May 22, 2024, 07:59:04 AMFor anyone who dont know, member Rating Place not long ago changed his username from Peeps PlaceOnce again I am convinced that the majority of those who changed their nicknames are more than dubious and suspicious personsQuote from: notblox1 on May 22, 2024, 07:59:04 AMHe has a long reputation in gambling section for asking money from casino to list them better on his list that nobody uses.If casino dont accept his offer than he is giving them low rating and always talks negative about that casino, supporting everyone who attacks them.After we didnt agree on many things I ignored him long time ago, and I only saw his posts when someone else quoted him.Few days ago after I did testing of one new casino member Rat, that is short from Rating Place, decided to abuse trust and accuse me for doing the same thing.I never had anything to do with him and we never traded, but he gave me negative feedback and accused me without proof for abusing trust and stalking posters. I dont know who are those stalked posters, but I cant stalk someone who I ignore.

comments.author: Excimer
comments.created_time: February 04, 2025, 04:35:11 PMLast edit: February 04, 2025, 04:46:30 PM by Excimer
comments.body: All offtopic removedLinks to deleted posts are provided so that everyone can verify that they are truly off-topic:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5418724.msg65004614#msg65004614https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5418724.msg65008820#msg65008820https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5418724.msg65026175#msg65026175The topic must match the topic. Off-topic will not alowed here. Only persons who have changed their nicknames are discussed here, which is more in line with the topicDiscussions/Complaints/Proposals of all things relating to username changing is here

comments.author: Excimer
comments.body: Oh my god, I would like to note that most of those who changed their nicknames are dubious persons with dubious trust reviews. I think I'm starting to understand why they want to run away from themselves. They probably want to hide from something under the pretext of some far-fetched compelling reason. iwantapony changed nickname to Murathttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=815246Quote from: Steamtyme on December 27, 2019, 02:47:53 PMUID 815246 Murat formerly iwantapony.

comments.author: Excimer
comments.body: Today we have a rare candidate. I didn't notice him in shady tricks. I will mark him in green. Usually I rarely grant such an honor to anyone.GuildMiners changed nickname to Vodhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=30747Quote from: Vod on February 06, 2025, 11:28:32 PMBTW - I changed my name from GuildMiners to Vod in 2012 or so.
